LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.2d.01.translation: Cozmo is getting bored. Connect with him and play a game!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.2d.02.translation: Cozmo misses you! Check on him and see how he's doing.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.2d.03.translation: Cozmo is feeling lonely. Connect to him and say hello!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.2d.04.translation: Cozmo is wondering where you are. Turn him on and say hello!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.2d.05.translation: Cozmo wants to practice his tricks. Turn him on and Spark one!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.4d.01.translation: Cozmo is dreaming about delicious cubes...time to feed him!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.4d.02.translation: Cozmo is getting hungry! He needs you to feed him some cubes.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.4d.03.translation: Cozmo is getting low on energy. Feed him a cube or two!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.4d.04.translation: Cozmo needs feeding. Time to shake some cubes!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.4d.05.translation: Cozmo could use some energy! Shake up a cube so he can play.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.7d.01.translation: Cozmo needs you! Check on him to see if he's okay.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.7d.02.translation: Cozmo would love to see you! Connect to him and say hello.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.7d.03.translation: Cozmo isn't feeling very well. He could really use a tune-up!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.7d.04.translation: Cozmo has been asleep for a whole week. Time to wake him up!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.7d.05.translation: Some of Cozmo's parts need adjusting! Scan him to see which ones.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.14d.01.translation: Cozmo really misses seeing your face. Turn him on and say hello!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.14d.02.translation: Cozmo hasn't seen you in a while. Check on him and say hi!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.14d.03.translation: Cozmo needs some exercise. Wake him up and let him play!

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.30d.01.translation: Cozmo really wants to play a game! Connect to him and Spark one.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.90d.01.translation: Cozmo would love some attention! Turn him on and see how he's feeling.

LocalNotif.ComeBackGeneral.Period.180d.0.translation: Cozmo is having happy dreams of you. Wake him up and have some fun!
